Notes.Text:
This update for virt-bootstrap fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-13314: Allow providing the container's root password using a file (bsc#1140750).

Vulnerabilities.Description: virt-bootstrap 1.1.0 allows local users to discover a root password by listing a process, because this password may be present in the --root-password option to virt_bootstrap.py.
